ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Just another newb
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Rico...ok, now the first of what I am sure will be many silly questions I could probably find answers to in the book (or ask him but i would rather
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Rico...ok, now the first of what I am sure will
be many "silly" questions I could probably find
answers to in the book (or ask him but i would rather
appear more knowledgable...LOL)...How does one check
to see if "friends" are on/playing?

--- Rico Pena <sage422@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html>

<div style='background-color:'><DIV>
<P>Hi Naara,</P>
<P>I am also on Ayonae Ro.  My characters are
Geoshin Level 46 Human Cleric, Aghee Level 15 Ogre
Warrior, and Jyuuza Level 17 Human Monk.  So if
you see any of these guys, send me a
tell.<BR></P></DIV>
<DIV>Rico </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>>From: nara MKs
<MASTERKIIS_NARA@...>
<DIV></DIV>>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
<DIV></DIV>>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
<DIV></DIV>>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Just
another newb
<DIV></DIV>>Date: Sat, 2 Mar 2002 15:17:21 -0800
(PST)
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>Thank you for the welcome and you are
right in that I
<DIV></DIV>>am able to play and not feel as if I am
neglecting
<DIV></DIV>>him. He is able to play much more than
I as he works
<DIV></DIV>>from home so his high level characters
have others
<DIV></DIV>>that he hunts with and he saves his
newer characters
<DIV></DIV>>to help me along. Whodda thunk one
could get so
<DIV></DIV>>hooked on our "virtual" lives
(smiles)...I look
<DIV></DIV>>forward to learning from all of you and
appreciate
<DIV></DIV>>having this list to go to...It answers
questions I
<DIV></DIV>>didn't know to ask and also lets me see
some things I
<DIV></DIV>>can look forward to
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>Naara
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>--- mlockridge01
<MLOCKRIDGE01@...>wrote:
<DIV></DIV>> > Welcome to the game. You are
already way ahead
<DIV></DIV>> > having someone in your
<DIV></DIV>> > life also sharing your virtual
life. In that way you
<DIV></DIV>> > can play without
<DIV></DIV>> > neglecting someone, but infact
bond with them in a
<DIV></DIV>> > very special way.
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> > Sadly, I am on the Zeb server, so
our hails will
<DIV></DIV>> > have to be here.
<DIV></DIV>> > This is a good list, and much
fellowship and advice
<DIV></DIV>> > shall be found
<DIV></DIV>> > here. It is a little slow here
right now, but has
<DIV></DIV>> > it's busy periods.
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> > I am a halfling druid as my
primary. Lvl 30. I am
<DIV></DIV>> > also a halfling
<DIV></DIV>> > warrior, lvl 8, and a gnome
magician, lvl 3. I have
<DIV></DIV>> > worked my primary
<DIV></DIV>> > most of the time, but now am
attending a bit more to
<DIV></DIV>> > my alts.
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> > Feel free to ask questions here.
This is a great
<DIV></DIV>> > place to share
<DIV></DIV>> > adventures, get advice, and share
what you have
<DIV></DIV>> > learned.
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> > Barto Proudfoot
<DIV></DIV>> > Halfling Druid
<DIV></DIV>> > Zeb server
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> > --- In EverQuest@y...,
"masterkiis_nara"
<DIV></DIV>> > <MASTERKIIS_NARA@Y...>wrote:
<DIV></DIV>> > > I am really new at the game
(have been playing
<DIV></DIV>> > only about a
<DIV></DIV>> > > month)...i am on the Ayonae
Ro server with a
<DIV></DIV>> > couple of characters
<DIV></DIV>> > > (lvl 9 Barb Warrior and lvl
5 Cleric...told you I
<DIV></DIV>> > was new...LOL)
<DIV></DIV>> > Was
<DIV></DIV>> > > just curious if anyone else
in on that
<DIV></DIV>> > server...usually am hunting
<DIV></DIV>> > > with the love of my life who
is teaching me the
<DIV></DIV>> > game but would be
<DIV></DIV>> > fun
<DIV></DIV>> > > to pass a friendly "Hail" to
those here on the
<DIV></DIV>> > list should our
<DIV></DIV>> > paths
<DIV></DIV>> > > cross...would that be proper
and acceptable EQ
<DIV></DIV>> > etiquette?? Just
<DIV></DIV>> > > curious :-)
<DIV></DIV>> > >
<DIV></DIV>> > > Naara
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>> >
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>__________________________________________________
